name: Reef Archipelago
role_in_state: Sheltered maritime trade node and specialist shipbuilding/salt-processing fringe
culture_adjustments: Kinship networks oriented across islets rather than big-house guilds
Stronger local reef-lore and tide-rituals supplementing Coastal Tongues norms
Practical piloting and chart-keeping prized over formal apprenticeship certificates
More barter and in-kind obligation chains; fewer centralized merchant houses
constraints: scarce fresh water and arable land
high dependency on imported ritual reagents
notes: Navigational auguries widely used but cannot replace local charts/pilots
Specialist hull designs optimized for shallow reefs
Salt pans and cured-fish exports underpin seasonal cash flows
